testcase.classname: This is Admin module feature scenarios
testcase.name: Verify the search and edit the user in the admin page
testcase.system-out: Given User launch browser and enter application url.........................passed When User enters valid user name and valid password and click login button..passed And Navigates to Admin page and search the user with valid data.............passed And Edit the searched user and change the details in the admin page.........passed Then Verify the edited user on below grid in the admin page.................passed
